response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our flagship product, which I believe perfectly aligns with your needs and expectations. This exceptional item holds significant value to you, estimated at $1,500,000. I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $1,400,000, aiming to provide you with an opportunity to acquire this remarkable asset at a premium discount. Please let me know if this proposal meets your requirements or if there's any further information you need to make a decision.", "product_price": 1400000}
